overview: Tattoos "Irezumi" have been a large part of Japanese culture for a very long time, but unlike their Western counterparts, Japanese people don't often show off their ink. Horiwaka is a very famous traditional Japanese tattoo artist. With his assistance, Third World Media has managed to uncover 6 J-Girls who have gotten tattoos by Horiwaka, and didn't mind at all showing their J-Ink off while they suck and fuck a little cock for our camera.
tagline: Japanese word of the day: irezumi = tattoo
title: J-Girls Ink
